00030 class Logger;

00042 class Board {
00043 public:
00047         enum ConfigStatus { 
00048                 NOT_CONFIGURED,         //>** FPGA is not configured
00049                 CONFIGURED,             //>** FPGA was configured successfully.
00050                 CRC_ERROR,                      //>** CRC Error after configuration.
00051                 BUSY                            //>** Device is busy.
00052         };
00053 
00059         static bool probe(Driver& dev) { return false; }
00060 
00065         virtual ~Board();
00066 
00074         virtual void setReg(const unsigned int address, const unsigned int value)=0;
00075         
00083         virtual unsigned int getReg(const unsigned int address)=0;
00084         
00092         virtual void write(const unsigned int address, const unsigned int value)=0;
00093 
00101         virtual unsigned int read(const unsigned int address)=0;
00102 
00112         virtual void writeBlock(const unsigned int address, const unsigned int *data, const unsigned int count, const bool inc = true );
00113 
00123         virtual void readBlock(const unsigned int address, unsigned int *data, const unsigned int count, const bool inc = true );
00124 
00136         virtual void writeDMA(const unsigned int address, const DMABuffer& buf, const unsigned int count, const unsigned int offset = 0, const bool inc = true, const bool lock=true );
00137 
00149         virtual void readDMA(const unsigned int address, DMABuffer& buf, const unsigned int count, const unsigned int offset = 0, const bool inc = true, const bool lock=true );
00150 
00154         void enableLog();
00155         
00159         void disableLog();
00160 
00164         inline Driver& getDriver() { return *driver; }
00165 
00169         virtual DMAEngine& getDMAEngine();
00170 
00178         virtual ConfigStatus config( const std::string& filename )=0;
00179 
00187         virtual ConfigStatus config( const char *filename )=0;
00188 
00197         virtual ConfigStatus config( unsigned int byteCount, const char *bitstream )=0;
00198 
00204         virtual void waitForInterrupt(unsigned int int_param)=0;
00205 
00206 protected:
00210         Logger *log;
00211 
00215         Driver *driver;
00216                 
00221         Board() {};
00222         
00223         /* Avoid copy constructor, and copy assignment operator */
00224

00229 
00233         Board& operator=(const Board&) { return *this; };
00234 }; /* class Board */
